typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> part
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> partsupp
part, partsupp join(P_PARTKEY == PS_PARTKEY,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerjoin
innerjoin sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> csv1
innerjoin sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> csv2
